author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bet-At-Home.Com FY Profit Up To EUR 32.8 Mln
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - BET-AT-HOME.COM AG:
* FY ‍EBITDA INCREASED BY 7.4%, REACHING EUR 35.5 MILLION​ * FY ‍NET BETTING AND GAMING REVENUE THEREFORE INCREASED BY 4.3% TO EUR 117.8 MILLION​
* FY ‍CONSOLIDATED PROFIT FOR 2017 INCREASED TO EUR 32.8 MILLION (FY 2016: EUR 31.0 MILLION)​
* ‍MANAGEMENT BOARD EXPECTS GROSS BETTING AND GAMING REVENUE INCREASING TO EUR 150 MILLION IN 2018 FY
* ‍WILL PROPOSE DISTRIBUTION OF A TOTAL DIVIDEND FOR 2017 WITHIN RANGE OF EUR 6.00 AND EUR 8.00 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
